title: PA-18-03: Prompt Release of Public Financial Disclosure Reports
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/F944B1EE5493BCA2852585BA005BEC29/$FILE/PA-18-03 Prompt Release of Public Financial Disclosure Reports.pdf?open
summary: This Program Advisory reminds Designated Agency Ethics Officials of their obligation to promptly make available copies of public financial disclosure reports filed with their agency.
